workItems.name: Easy Quest Creator
workItems.shortDesc: Lets user create quest faster using graph based editors
workItems.description:
Quest System is a plugin that lets developer or level designer to create Quests and Events without doing a lot of coding or no coding at all as the plugin supports blueprint also.

Features :

  • Use Node based Graphs to create complex quests and Events
  • Easily create branching Quests
  • Decoupled workflow saves time as there won't be dependencies between quest creators and scriptwriters
  • High code reusability
  • Multiple quest tracking feature.

Code Modules :

  • Quest - Core Runtime module
  • Quest Editor - Editor module

Editors added :

  • Quest Graph Editor
  • Branch Editor
  • Event Graph Editor
  • Levels Map Editor

New Editor Assets :

  • Quest Graph
  • Quest/Goal Details Asset
  • Event Graph
  • Levels Graph

workItems.name: Reactive Environment
workItems.shortDesc: Very simple compute shader based reactive environment
workItems.description:
Reactive Environment plugin is an experimental plugin that I developed to test the compute shader capabilities in Unreal Engine.

How to use :

  • Add the reactive environment actor to level
  • Add reactiveLand tag to land in which actor to be reacted to and reactiveWater tag to water that needs to be reactive
  • Easy to make any actor reactive just add reactive or reactiveIdle or reactiveLocal tags to actor and components that needs to be reactive
  • The plugin writes the output to three resolved textures which you can use in your materials
  • For sampling resolved texture, material functions in the plugin shall be used.

Code Modules :

  • Reactive Env - Core Runtime module
  • Reactive Env Editor - Editor module

New Editor Assets :

  • Resolvable 2D Texture(Works like Cheap Render Target for the plugin)

workItems.name: Message Protocols Plugin
workItems.shortDesc: Allows creating custom connection either Unreal Instance - Unreal Instance or Unreal Instance - Other Applications
workItems.description:
The plugin as the name suggests is a wrapper around Unreal's Messaging(Network) and Sockets Modules. This plugin simplifies the custom network creation between Unreal - Unreal instances or Unreal - Other Applications to just two function call open and close connection. Right now the plugin supports TCP and UDP Connections. The connections are multithreaded so there is no game thread blocking(In multithreaded platform) and there is option to control the sending and receiving frequency from settings.

This plugin supports sending/receiving raw float,int,string and also Unreal Structs in format of json(Required in case of Unreal - Other Applications). There is few light weight message parsers provided with plugin how ever if you prefer to use someother protocols you can wrap the protocol inside BaseMessageProtocolParser class and use it as parser. Right now this plugin works best with C++.

Features :

  • Very easy to use with very little setup procedure
  • Supports JSON messaging
  • Multithreaded
  • Extendable framework that gives you ability to create custom connections too
  • Supports any Message Parser of User's desire

Code Modules :

  • MessageProtocols - Core Runtime module

Steps :

  • Add plugin to project
  • Create blueprint class from one of exposed connection class
  • Enter necessary IP/Port settings
  • Select the message parser you would like to use for this connection
  • Call OpenConnection passing the created blueprint class
  • Send necessary data
  • Don't forget to close the connection
